economy.work: :m: | You just worked from {0}, you have just been added to your account:

info.contact1: To contact my creator you must open a ticket on the following server
info.help1: :x: | I could not find that command!
info.help20:
```Hello, how are you?
I am a multifunctional bot, I will help you on your server.```
**Categories:**
:a: :i:**Information**
:a: :s:**Configuration**
:a: :t:**Tickets**
:a: :sh:**Moderation**
:a: :m:**Economy**
:a: :ma:**Marriage**
:a: :h:**Interaction**
:a: :to:**Utility**
:a: :pe:**Images** :n:

**Upcoming Categories:**
:a: :l:**Levels**

```yml
To invite the bot you can use the button below or you can also go to the support server if you have any questions or problems!```

info.report6: I do not want to send the report
info.report8:
```The message will be sent to the support server
So try not to use the wrong command```
**Emoji Info:**
:p: = Send the report
:x: = Do not send the report
